other_tests.findings: The gallbladder has an edematous wall, measuring up to 9 mm, and a small amount of pericholecystic fluid is seen. A 1.6-cm gallstone is seen impacted at the neck of the gallbladder. Several additional calcified gallstones and layering sludge are present within the gallbladder. The common duct measures 3 mm, and there is no intra- or extra-hepatic bile duct dilatation.
